name: Teleportation
description:
Two unoccupied spaces within physical
range are linked with a 6' portal.
Opening portals to unfamiliar locations
is possible, yet may result in undesirable
results. However, magical structures and
gateways may be utilized to safely open
portals to unfamiliar locations.
The narrator may let portals to open
into temporal ranges. If they do, expend
separate FP for both the physical and
temporal range.
